title: My thoughts on Darius
body:
He looks severely outclassed by champions like Riven, his early game isn't strong enough for how hard he falls off in the late game, he will get kited to oblivion by the enemy apc/adc, and only if they are bronze/silver/low gold will they easily get hooked by his short ranged e. 

Riven offers the same as Darius but greater.

Riven vs Darius
1. Riven manaless/energless.
2. Riven deals burst damage, Darius sustained damage.
3. Riven has an easier job at blowing up squishies due to e, q and flash.
4. Riven deals greater aoe.

Darius however acts as a better frontline tank and can threaten opponents with his E.
(Darius needs to build correctly ofc, must darius go Hydra,Triforce,BT, lw.
